tools/volumeSegments.c

00037 /**
00038  * \file volumeSegments.c
00039  * \brief calculate volumes of segments of dataset based on thresholding
00040  *        a variable.
00041  *
00042  * $Source: /home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/volumeSegments.c,v $
00043  * $Revision: 1.15 $
00044  * $Date: 2006/11/07 23:49:03 $
00045  *
00046  * \description
00047  *    Usage: volumeSegments dataset "variable name" "op" threshold_value
00048  *    doStrict 
00049  *
00050  *    "op: is the threshold operator such as ">", "<=",
00051  *    "==", etc. Quotes are required around the op string, but can be
00052  *    dropped around the variable name if there are no spaces or 
00053  *    punctuation in the name. "doStrict" is used in the call to
00054  *    fc_copySubsetWithNewAssocation and more info on it can be found
00055  *    there.
00056  *
00057  *    Example: volumeSegments data.ex2 "cool factor" ">" 0.5 1
00058  *
00059  *    Prints to stdout the volumes of segments in the dataset
00060  *    for which the given variable is above the given threshold value.
00061  *    The format of the output is one line per segment (per
00062  *    step, if its a sequence variable) with form
00063  *
00064  *    Volume of segmentname = vol
00065  *
00066  *    where, segmentname is the name of the segment
00067  *    and vol is the volume of the segment, not of the bounding box
00068  *    of the segment. Steps are designated by step number, if appropriate.
00069  *    Total volume covered and percent volume covered are also given.
00070  *    Outputs error message if mesh dim < 3D.
00071  *   
00072  *
00073  * \modifications
00074  *   - 10/04/04 AG based on threshBoundBox & varStats
00075  *   - 11/22/04 AG revised for updated fclib
00076  *   - 11/23/04 AG renamed to volumeSegments and created new volumeSubsets.
00077  *   - 11/30/04 AG replaced with new getSubsetVolume and added doStrict flag
00078  *   - 06/08/2006 WSD add option to do with displacements
00079  */
00080 
00081 #include <string.h>
00082 #include "fc.h"
00083 
00084 static int isThresholdable(FC_Variable);
00085 static int calcSegmentsVolumes(FC_Subset,int, FC_Variable* point_to_displ_var);
00086 
00087 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00088   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00089   int i;
00090   int numMesh;
00091   int doStrict;
00092   FC_Dataset ds;
00093   FC_Mesh* meshes;
00094   double threshold;
00095   char* file_name = NULL;
00096   char* mesh_name;
00097   char* var_name;
00098   char* displ_name = NULL;
00099   char* op;
00100   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00101   int doDispl = 0;
00102 
00103 
00104   // handle arguments
00105   if (argc < 5) {
00106   usage:
00107     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset \"var name\" \"op\" thresh_value doStrict\n", argv[0]);
00108     printf("options: \n");
00109     printf("   -d var_name  : calc the displaced volumes using this displacement\n");
00110     printf("                  variable\n");
00111     printf("   -h           : print this help message\n");
00112     printf("   -v           : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00113     printf("   -V           : very verbose: print log and error messages\n");
00114     printf("\n");
00115     printf("Prints to stdout the volumes of segments in the dataset\n");
00116     printf("for which the given variable satisfies the threshold operation.\n");
00117     printf("\"op\" is an operator such as \">\", \"<=\", \"==\", etc.\n");
00118     printf("Quotes are required around the op string, but can be dropped\n");
00119     printf("around the variable name if it contains no spaces or\n");
00120     printf("punctuation. \"doStrict\" is used in the internal call to\n");
00121     printf("fc_copySubsetWithNewAssociation and more info can be found there.\n");
00122     printf("\n");
00123     printf("Example: %s data.ex2 \"cool factor\" \">\" 0.5 1\n", argv[0]);
00124     printf("\n");
00125     printf("The format of the output is one line per segment\n");
00126     printf("(per step if it is a sequence variable) with form:\n");
00127     printf("\tVolume of segment segmentname = vol\n");
00128     printf("where segmentname is the name of the segment,\n");
00129     printf("and vol is the volume of the segment, not of the bounding\n");
00130     printf("box of the segment. Steps are indicated by step index, if\n");
00131     printf("appropriate. Total volume covered and percent volume are also\n");
00132     printf("given.\n");
00133     printf("\n");
00134     printf("Outputs error message if dimension < 3D.\n");
00135     fflush(NULL);
00136     exit(-1);
00137   }
00138 
00139   
00140   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00141     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00142       doDispl = 1;
00143       i++;
00144       displ_name = argv[i];
00145     }
00146     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00147       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00148     }
00149     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00150       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00151     }
00152     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00153       goto usage;
00154     else {
00155       if (i+4 >= argc)
00156         goto usage;
00157       file_name = argv[i];
00158       var_name = argv[i+1];
00159       op = argv[i+2];
00160       threshold = atof(argv[i+3]);
00161       doStrict = atoi(argv[i+4]);
00162       i+=4;
00163     }
00164   }
00165   if (!file_name)
00166     goto usage;
00167   
00168   // init library and load dataset
00169   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00170   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00171   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00172   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00173   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00174   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc,"Can't load dataset\n");
00175 
00176   // get number of meshes and setup var arrays
00177   rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00178 
00179 
00180   printf("Subset volume summary for dataset '%s'\n",file_name);
00181   fflush(NULL);
00182   
00183   if (numMesh < 1){
00184     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00185     fflush(NULL);
00186     exit(0);
00187   } else {
00188     printf("%d meshes:\n", numMesh);
00189     fflush(NULL);
00190     
00191     // loop over meshes
00192     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00193       int meshTopoDim = 0, numStep;
00194       FC_Variable var_handle;
00195       FC_Variable displ, *seqDispl = NULL;
00196 
00197       fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_name);
00198       //see if want to do areas at some point
00199       rc = fc_getMeshTopodim(meshes[i], &meshTopoDim);
00200       if (meshTopoDim < 3){
00201         printf("Can't calculate volume on mesh '%s' dimensionality too small = %d\n",
00202                mesh_name, meshTopoDim);
00203         fflush(NULL);
00204         free(mesh_name);
00205         continue;
00206       }
00207 
00208       if (doDispl) {
00209      rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00210                                 &displ);
00211      fc_exitIfError(rc); 
00212      if (!FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(displ, FC_NULL_VARIABLE) && 
00213          !fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], displ)) {
00214        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "'%s' is not a valid displ variable",
00215                       displ_name);
00216      }
00217 
00218      rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00219                                    &numStep, &seqDispl);
00220      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00221      if (seqDispl && !fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i],seqDispl[0])) {
00222        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "'%s' is not a valid displ variable",
00223                       displ_name);
00224      }
00225 
00226      if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(displ, FC_NULL_VARIABLE) && seqDispl == NULL) {
00227        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Could not find displ variable '%s'", 
00228                       displ_name);
00229      }
00230       }
00231       
00232       printf("Results for mesh '%s':\n",mesh_name);
00233       fflush(NULL);
00234       //check if basic var
00235       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name,
00236                               &var_handle);
00237       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00238       if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(var_handle, FC_NULL_VARIABLE)){
00239        fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00240                       var_name);
00241       }
00242       
00243       if (fc_isVariableValid(var_handle)){
00244         if (isThresholdable(var_handle)){
00245           //      printf("Subset on mesh %s:\n",mesh_name);
00246           char* sub_name = "temp_subset";
00247           FC_Subset subs_handle;
00248           
00249           rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(var_handle, op, threshold, sub_name,
00250                                         &subs_handle); //gives me all the ids
00251           fc_exitIfError(rc);
00252           
00253           //now get contiguous segments
00254        if (doDispl) {
00255          if (seqDispl) {
00256            int j;
00257            for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00258           printf("Step %d:\n", j);
00259           rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle,doStrict,&seqDispl[j]);
00260           fc_exitIfError(rc);
00261            }
00262          }
00263          else {
00264            rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle,doStrict,&displ);
00265            fc_exitIfError(rc);
00266          }
00267        }
00268        else {
00269          rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle,doStrict,NULL);
00270          fc_exitIfError(rc);
00271        }
00272         }
00273       } else {
00274         //check if seq var
00275         FC_Variable* seq_var_handles;
00276         int temp_numStep;
00277      int j;
00278 
00279      rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name,
00280                                    &temp_numStep,
00281                                    &seq_var_handles);
00282         fc_exitIfError(rc);
00283      if (!seq_var_handles){
00284        fc_printfErrorMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00285                     var_name);
00286      }
00287 
00288         if (fc_isSeqVariableValid(temp_numStep,seq_var_handles)){
00289           if(isThresholdable(seq_var_handles[0])){
00290             //do step by step
00291             for (j=0; j < temp_numStep; j++){
00292               char* sub_name = "temp_subset";
00293               FC_Subset subs_handle;
00294               
00295               printf("Step %d:\n",j);
00296               fflush(NULL);
00297               rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(seq_var_handles[j], op, threshold,
00298                                             sub_name, &subs_handle); //gives me all the ids
00299               fc_exitIfError(rc);
00300               
00301               //now get contiguous segments
00302            if (doDispl) {
00303           if (temp_numStep != numStep)
00304             fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, 
00305                            "the var and displ var have different numStep");
00306           if (seqDispl) 
00307             rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle, doStrict, &seqDispl[j]);
00308           else 
00309             rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle, doStrict, &displ);
00310            }
00311            else 
00312           rc = calcSegmentsVolumes(subs_handle, doStrict, NULL);
00313            fc_exitIfError(rc);
00314             }
00315           }
00316         } else {
00317           printf("Cannot get variable '%s'\n", var_name);
00318           fflush(NULL);
00319           continue;
00320      }
00321         free(seq_var_handles);
00322       }
00323 
00324       fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00325       if (seqDispl) free(seqDispl);
00326       free(mesh_name);
00327     }
00328   }
00329   free(meshes);
00330   fc_finalLibrary();
00331   exit(0);
00332 }
00333 
00334 int calcSegmentsVolumes(FC_Subset subs_handle, int doStrict, FC_Variable* displ_p){
00335 
00336   int i;
00337   FC_Subset* segments;
00338   FC_Mesh mesh; 
00339   int numSegments;
00340   double coveredvol = 0.0;
00341   double meshvol = -1.0;
00342 
00343   //get segments
00344   FC_ReturnCode rc = fc_segment(subs_handle, 0, &numSegments, &segments);
00345   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00346 
00347   for (i = 0; i < numSegments; i++){
00348     double vol = 0.0;
00349     char* seg_name;
00350     rc = fc_getSubsetName(segments[i],&seg_name);
00351     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00352     if (displ_p) 
00353       rc = fc_getDisplacedSubsetVolume(segments[i], doStrict, *displ_p,  &vol);
00354     else
00355       rc = fc_getSubsetVolume(segments[i],doStrict,&vol);
00356     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00357     printf("\tVolume of segment '%s' = %f\n",seg_name,vol);
00358     fflush(NULL);
00359     coveredvol+=vol;
00360     free(seg_name);
00361     fc_deleteSubset(segments[i]);
00362   }
00363   free(segments);
00364 
00365   rc = fc_getMeshFromSubset(subs_handle,&mesh);
00366   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00367   if (displ_p)
00368     rc = fc_getDisplacedMeshVolume(mesh, *displ_p, &meshvol);
00369   else
00370     rc = fc_getMeshVolume(mesh,&meshvol);
00371   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00372   printf("\tPercent coverage = %f\n",(coveredvol/meshvol));
00373   fflush(NULL);
00374 
00375   return FC_SUCCESS;
00376 }
00377 
00378 int isThresholdable(FC_Variable var_handle){
00379   int numComp;
00380   FC_ReturnCode rc = fc_getVariableNumComponent(var_handle,&numComp);
00381   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00382   if (numComp != 1){
00383     char* var_name;
00384     rc = fc_getVariableName(var_handle,&var_name);
00385     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00386     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Cannot threshold variable '%s' because it has more than one component\n", var_name);
00387   }
00388   return 1;
00389 }
